content.text:
# List of State Register of Heritage Places in the Shire of Bruce Rock

The State Register of Heritage Places is maintained by the Heritage Council of Western Australia. , 210 places are heritage-listed in the Shire of Bruce Rock, of which four are on the State Register of Heritage Places.
List
The Western Australian State Register of Heritage Places, , lists the following four state registered places within the Shire of Bruce Rock:
